mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `family_doctor_personnel` AS p WHERE p.`name`=#{name}

SELECT unit_id as unitId, SUM(p.personnel_category ='2')doctorNum, SUM(p.personnel_category ='3')nurseNum, SUM(p.personnel_category ='4')healthCoordinatorNum, SUM(p.personnel_category ='5')healthManageNum, SUM(p.personnel_category ='6')dietitianNum, SUM(p.personnel_category ='7')consultantNum from family_doctor_personnel as p GROUP BY p.unit_id;

SELECT p.id, p.unit_id AS unitId, t.team_name AS teamName, p.`name`, p.sex, p.age, j.`name` AS jobRank, c.`name` AS personnelCategory, p.is_team_captain AS isTeamCaptain FROM family_doctor_personnel AS p LEFT JOIN family_doctor_team AS t ON p.team_id = t.id LEFT JOIN (select `code`,`name` from sys_constant where type='job-rank-type') AS j on j.`code`=p.job_rank LEFT JOIN (select `code`,`name` from sys_constant where type='personnel-category-type') AS c on c.`code`=p.personnel_category ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
